title: ‘Hey Kanye, f--k yo 30 showers’
text:
Amber Rose leads SlutWalk protest, breaks down speaking of ex-lovers Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Amber Rose leads SlutWalk protest, breaks down speaking of ex-lovers Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Choking up ... Amber Rose struggles to hold back tears as she speaks of her exes Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa. Picture: YouTube/Hollywood Fix 
WARNING: Graphic language 
AMBER Rose was a bundle of emotions when she was joined by hundreds of scantily-clad backers as she led a protest against sexual violence and ‘slut-shaming’. 
The curvaceous 31-year-old actor and model was all smiles as she led the SlutWalk march in Los Angeles with the support of her mother, waving a sign that read ‘Strippers Have Feelings Too’. 
But when she opened up onstage about being slut-shamed as a mere 14-year-old and raised her nasty high-profile breakups in front of the crowd of people at the weekend event, she broke down in tears. Proud protester 
In a clip posted on YouTube , Rose spoke of her emotional pain in the wake of slanderous comments made be her rapper ex-lovers, Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa . 
Most famously, Kanye said in a radio interview he had to take 30 showers after breaking up with Rose before Kim Kardashian would have considered hooking up with him. Other Stories
